title: Can i have my game back please
body:
Right so i was in my 2nd flex que game which both teams dc'd from and when we all connected back into the game both teams had ping in the couple of thousands.This resulted in both team buying a zzrot portal and praying to RNGesus (riots favorite god lately) that you win.I got a loss for a game that neither team had any real say in who won.It was a super frustrating 27min for both teams,So id be most appreciative if i got that game back
thanks for reading,Filthy riven main

replies.body:
Unfortunately, we cannot modify or remove losses. The *Loss forgiven* you sometimes see for matches are only enabled if issues are coming from our side and we've confirmed the issue. We're unable to retroactively apply this for matches. I can't find a record of any server stability issues from our side, so this may have been caused by an ISP or backbone provider that multiple players in the game were connecting through.

If you experience this again, please let me know so we can take a look at some possible solutions.
well that sucks but thank you anyway for replying{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
+1 was in the game, We could at least get loss forgiven :)
